name: Fists of Jank
description:
Fists of Jank is a somewhat unusual arcade-y platformer beat 'em up where you attempt to survive as long as you can against an endless horde of enemies.

Features:

  • Intentional jank!
  • Unintentional jank!
  • Enemies!
  • You can jump infinitely and I won't say whether or not this was originally intentional!
  • Did I mention jank?
  • You can beat up oversized zombies or something I guess
  • We are not intentionally responsible for any spinning back and forth that spiders may do. They decided to do it one day, and by one day I mean when they were first implemented, totally not because of an oversight, and we just rolled with it, who are we to judge?

Enjoy the game...?

Also, please do leave feedback in the comments! As weird as this game may be, I'm serious about trying to make a high-quality game out of this!
